pkgmetadata.longdescription: Strategy Estimation // Variants of strategy estimation (Dal Bo Frechette, 2011, doi:10.1257/aer.101.1.411), including the model with parameters for the choice probabilities of the strategies (Breitmoser, 2015, doi:10.1257/aer.20130675), and the model with individual level covariates for the selection of strategies by individuals (Dvorak Fehrler, 2018, doi:10.2139/ssrn.2986445).
